// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(function() {
    'use strict';

// menuBotao

const menuBotao = document.createElement('button')

    menuBotao.id = 'firedeluxe_neon_menuButton'
    menuBotao.textContent = '[ MENU ]';
    menuBotao.style.color = 'orange';
    menuBotao.style.backgroundColor = 'transparent';
    menuBotao.style.zIndex = '9998';
    menuBotao.style.position = 'fixed';
    menuBotao.style.fontSize = '4vw';
    menuBotao.style.border = 'none';
    menuBotao.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
    menuBotao.style.padding = '10px 15px';
    menuBotao.style.top = '0px';
    menuBotao.style.textShadow = '';

document.body.appendChild(menuBotao);

// menuBotao_funcao

  menuBotao.addEventListener('click', menuBotao_funcao);
  
  function menuBotao_funcao()
{
  const menuBotao_overlay = document.getElementById('firedeluxe_menuBotao_overlay');
  menuBotao_overlay.style.display = 'block';   
}

})();

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(function() {
    'use strict';

// menuBotao_overlay

const menuBotao_overlay = document.createElement('div');

menuBotao_overlay.id = 'firedeluxe_menuBotao_overlay'
menuBotao_overlay.style.backgroundColor = '#000000';
menuBotao_overlay.style.opacity = '0.5';
menuBotao_overlay.style.position = 'fixed';
menuBotao_overlay.style.width = '100%';
menuBotao_overlay.style.height = '100%';
menuBotao_overlay.style.zIndex = '9999';
menuBotao_overlay.style.left = '0';
menuBotao_overlay.style.top = '0';
menuBotao_overlay.style.borderRadius = '0';
menuBotao_overlay.style.display = 'none';

document.body.appendChild(menuBotao_overlay);

})();

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(function() {
    'use strict';

// menuBotao_overlay_botoes

class menuBotao_overlay_botoes_class {
    constructor(id, texto) {
        this.overlay_botao = document.createElement('button');
        this.overlay_botao.id = id;
        this.overlay_botao.textContent = texto;
        this.overlay_botao.style.backgroundColor = 'transparent';
        this.overlay_botao.style.color = 'orange';
        this.overlay_botao.style.borderColor = 'orange';
        this.overlay_botao.style.fontSize = '5vw';
        this.overlay_botao.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
        this.overlay_botao.style.padding = '10px 15px';
        this.overlay_botao.style.textShadow = '';
        this.overlay_botao.style.zIndex = '9999'
    }

    adicionarAoBody() 
    {
    document.body.appendChild(this.overlay_botao);
    }
    
}

const menuBotao_overlay_botoes_Configuracoes = new menuBotao_overlay_botoes_class('firedeluxe_neon_overlay_botoes_Configuracoes', 'Configurações');

menuBotao_overlay_botoes_Configuracoes.adicionarAoBody();

})();
